nodes.text: The Women Of Star Wars was a feature article in Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 12, written by Rebecca Moesta with drawings by Michael Butkus colored by David Larks. In addition to Princess Leia, the article profiled several key female Star Wars characters: Jaina Solo, Teneniel Djo, Tenel Ka, Gaeriel Captison, Tionne, Callista, Nomi Sunrider, Tahiri, the Nightsisters of Dathomir, Ta'a Chume, Daala, Ysanne Isard, Qwi Xux, Mara Jade, Xaverri, Lusa, and Salla Zend.
